thread.title: NASA Provides High-tech Texas Storm Disaster Response

author: Mark Carreau
title: NASA Provides High-tech Texas Storm Disaster Response
text:
HOUSTONâ€“In response to the disastrous July 4 weekend flooding in the Texas Hill Country, NASA is contributing high-technology airborne responses from its Johnson Space Center (JSC) in Houston and the Armstrong Flight Research Center in California, according to a July 9 advisory. As of late July 10...
